version_description:
路 New iCity Cloud Sync, all your data is safely stored in the cloud
路 New interface design, providing you with three different style themes
路 More home screen icons
路 Other details improvement and optimization

iHour 3.0 is now available with evolution of Focus Timer and Spacetime Monster
- Brand New "Focus Timer": Beautiful themes, ambient sounds, disable phone mode to help you focus!
- Spacetime Monsters: Hatch spacetime monsters when you stay focused
